title: Legacy of Srila Narottama Dasa Thakura & Disciples | Sri Jai Chaitanya Dasa| Gaura Mandala Parikrama
speaker: HG Jai Chaitanya Dasa

segments.key_quote: His disappearance was just as milk vanishes in water.
segments.summary: This segment describes the location of Narottama Das Thakur's disappearance and the manner in which he left this world.

segments.key_quote: Without seeing their face, my heart is pierced, just like a doe struck by a poisonous arrow.
segments.summary: This segment discusses Narottama Das Thakur's contributions to Vaishnava philosophy and describes a scene of his lamentation before his disappearance.

segments.key_quote: merely by touch of their hands, Narottama Das Thakur Mahasaya's body melted and vanished into the Ganges.
segments.summary: This segment narrates the final moments of Narottama Das Thakur's life, focusing on his departure and the reactions of his disciples and the demigods.

segments.key_quote: Suddenly, due to the favor of their guru, Krishna, and the Vaishnavas, everyone had a chance to witness Narottama Das dancing with them again.
segments.summary: This segment describes the arrangements made after Narottama Das Thakur's disappearance, including a festival and a miraculous reappearance of Narottama Das Thakur.

segments.key_quote: Krishna's devotees peacefully tolerate all insults and abuses to themselves, but they strike like fire against offenders to their beloved Guru or worshipable Lord Shri Krishna.
segments.summary: This segment introduces Ganga Narayan Chakraborty, a disciple of Narottama Das Thakur, and recounts a story of how he and another disciple defended their guru against criticism from Smartha brahmanas.

segments.key_quote: if you can't even defeat these two common ordinary disciples of Narottam Das Thakur, how will you even defeat Narottam Das himself?
segments.summary: This segment continues the story of Ganga Narayan and Ramachandra's defense of Narottama Das Thakur, culminating in King Narasimha and the Dikvijaya Pandit taking initiation from Narottama Das Thakur.

themes: Narottama Das's love for the Deity
segments.key_quote: Narottam Das was mad in ecstasy love, ecstatic love with his beloved Gauravishnupriya Deity.
segments.summary: This segment describes the location of Ganga Narayan's Samadhi and tells the story of how Narottama Das Thakur discovered the Golden Gauranga Deity, emphasizing his deep love for the deity.
